about:
Hello!
Yeap, that's **me**! and that's my Maltese dog **Rosa**!
I'm a Tunisian 🇹🇳 Computer Science Engineer
Here are some of my interests so in case we meet, we can easily break the ice:
🐾 I love both cats 🐱 and dogs 🐶
🇰🇷 I like K-pop and asian culture in general 🇰🇷
⛩️ I watch lots of anime 🌸
🎮 I play League of Legends and Genshin Impact
💭 I read a lot of philosophical texts and engage in intellectual debates 🤔
📚 I'm trying to write a collection of short stories
